title: Buying or Selling Latest MLB Offseason Hot Stove Rumors
content:
While the MLB postseason may be quickly approaching, rumors about the offseason have already begun to leak. 
 
Is Dustin Pedroia's position in Boston safe? Will Yoenis  Cespedes return to Queens and the New York Mets next season? 
 
Watch as Stephen Nelson and Bleacher Report National MLB Columnist Scott Miller take a look at some of the latest Hot Stove rumors in the video above.
